articles.description: THE SPFL Trust has today recieved the single biggest personal donation in Scottish football history - via the way of James Anderson.
articles.content:
THE SPFL Trust has today recieved the single biggest personal donation in Scottish football history - via the way of James Anderson.
The Edinburgh philanthropist has gifted £3,125,000 in a bid to he… [+3553 chars]
